archimate:Resource.name: Repository
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB represents a generic storage and enables organizations to organize, govern, and manage their valuable artifacts and assets scattered throughout the enterprise and to encourage re-use of existing assets within the organization. It provides the ability to search for the artifact and asset by different perspectives such as for general description, classification, usage, and content.

properties.value: This ABB represents a generic storage and enables organizations to organize, govern, and manage their valuable artifacts and assets scattered throughout the enterprise and to encourage re-use of existing assets within the organization.
